meanings.definition: Pretend to be (someone else) by using their name or identity.
meanings.sent1: She personates her favorite character when playing dress-up.
meanings.sent2: He personates a famous actor in the school play.
meanings.sent3: The little girl personates a princess during tea parties.
meanings.sent4: The spy personates a waiter to gather information.
meanings.sent5: The chameleon personates a leaf to blend into its surroundings.

meanings.definition: Represent or act the part of (someone else) on stage.
meanings.sent1: The actor personates a king in the Shakespeare play.
meanings.sent2: She personates a detective in the murder mystery performance.
meanings.sent3: The comedian personates a famous singer for a hilarious skit.
meanings.sent4: The student personates a scientist in the science fair presentation.
meanings.sent5: The robot personates a human to learn about emotions.
